column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I noticed it was getting warmer out and it would be a nice time to exercise so I took my bicycle out to see if it needed any maintenance .
#text=At first everything looked good and I was ready to ride but then I noticed that the front tire was a little flat .
#text=I had some tools in my garage so I picked up the bike and placed it on my workbench .
#text=First I removed the wheel and checked as best I could to make sure there were no tears or other types of damage .
#text=There was just a very small tear so I got out the patching kit that I 'd purchased from the sports store last summer .
#text=I cleaned the area around the tear and applied the patch .
#text=After waiting for a while , I put the tire back on my bike and re-inflated the tire .
#text=The patch held and I was able to go for a bike ride that day .
